title: Sindo Baptist Church, Koma Bay, Kenya
content: "Learning from home alone is very difficult. I needed someone who could walk with me as I did my schoolwork. Having a teacher come home is so helpful to me. I also learn life skills and godliness," says Antony.

title: Deliverance Church, Kendu Bay, Kenya
content: Welcome! I'm Richard Sijenyi, one of Compassion's project facilitators in Kenya. So glad you've come, we're excited to show you are work and what life is like for our children.

title: St Barnabus, Kisumu, Kenya
content: Hello, I'm Billups. Join me in praising God!  Our efforts at helping caregivers start businesses have reduced their financial dependency by 30% since the parents now have their own sources of income, making them independent. Many youth have also been innovative in starting businesses and doing college programming while away from their local churches.

title: Welcome Church, Kisumu, Kenya
content: CONGRATULATIONS & thank you!  Take one more step with us.  Step into a typical day for a young girl living in poverty in Kenya. With the support of Compassionâ€™s local church partners, these girls have the support they need to rise above their circumstances with determination and hope. These girls are like any girls, anywhere. They love to learn and play and have big dreams. However, like more than one-third of Kenyans, they live below the poverty line, and they face confronting challenges.
